text: The 2013 NCAA Division I Men's Swimming and Diving Championships were contested in March 2013 at the Indiana University Natatorium in Indianapolis, Indiana at the 90th annual NCAA-sanctioned swim meet to determine the team and individual national champions of Division I men's collegiate swimming and diving in the United States. Michigan topped the team standings, finishing 73.5 points ahead of two-time defending champions California. It was the Wolverines' then-record twelfth men's team title and first since 1995. ==Team standings== *Note: Top 10 only *(DC) = Defending champions *Full results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
